6. Harmonic Clusters in Pop Charts¶

Clustering analysis in [SVJ+20].

def zipf_mandelbrot(x, a, b, c):
   """Zipf-Mandelbrot function of `x` given parameters `a`, `b`, `c`."""
   z = a / ( (b + x)**c )
   return z
